thread.title: Παναγιώτης Κωνσταντίνου
thread.title_full: The Pi Hut reviewed by Παναγιώτης Κωνσταντίνου

author: Παναγιώτης Κωνσταντίνου
title: Παναγιώτης Κωνσταντίνου
text: I was looking for the Pi Zero W which is on high demand. The site is very easy to navigate and provided plenty of options to buy an item. I found it convenience. The best part is that the item shipped on same day which is pretty awesome for the specific item! Overall it was a good experience. I will buy again for sure.
